website_summaries.verdict: A superior range hood that ducts horizontally or vertically for added convenience and is easy to install.
pros: Includes a 75-watt cooktop light that delivers exceptional power
Equipped with a washable aluminum mesh grease filter
Two-speed rocker-type fan is constructed to last
Sold with a duct adapter with built-in damper
Keyhole mounting slots make the range hood easier to install than many comparable options
cons: Limited ability to remove cooking fumes

customer_reviews.title: Range Hood viewed underneath
customer_reviews.text: I just received my new range hood and have attached a picture from under the hood, as this is not on the web site!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Follower

customer_reviews.title: Beware! The 1st line in the description states "Non-Ducted" and has filtration. It has neither
customer_reviews.text: The 1st line in the description is "HIGH-QUALITY HOOD INSERT: Hood insert improves ventilation and lighting over your stove with the non-ducted filtration system that effectively removes smoke and odors at 160 CFM and 6.5 Sones". If you go to Broan or anyone else's website under this model number it states VENTED installation only. Bought this to put up temporarily at a clients home while the wood hood was getting its liner fabricated, and ended up with a product I can't use. My client is pissed, as am I. DO NOT go by the description it is not correct.
customer_reviews.author: JohnD

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is...
customer_reviews.text: This is a bare-bones range hood, best for installs that don't require outside venting. Absolutely bog-standard (to the point that the screws from our original 1987 Kenmore range hood perfectly matched, making replacement a breeze.) The fan is however exceptionally loud and in a vent-less situation has no exit ports. It is literally useless, except as a light source above the range. For less than 40 bucks, it's a bargain and looks nicer than the hood it replaced, but otherwise it is exactly what it claims to be.
customer_reviews.author: Six Blue Monkeys

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised
customer_reviews.text: I installed the hood by myself last night. It took about an hour - maybe not quite that long. The toughest part was lifting it up to secure to the top part of the space left by the previous version. Once I got that problem solved, it was easy. The problem I had wasn't one I would suspect that everyone would have. The screws put into the wood to hold up the hood with the nice slots created in the sheet metal were actually in some less than supporting material. My problem, not the hood's.
customer_reviews.author: Edith Allyn-Page

customer_reviews.title: Item looked like it was a return
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the hood because I have installed the same one in a rental & it works well. I was not happy with the packaging, content was sliding all over the place. Also, it was a returned item it had already been put together & was missing the mounting bolts. If I had not needed it right then, I would have returned it. This was a first for me.
customer_reviews.author: Donna S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Never found a better hood. Price is perfect, light weight, easy to install, a few screws, wired the electrical plug and you're in business. Install a LED light and see everything. The switches work perfect, light is on off, fan is Low High Off (CFM not too high, but does work pulling evaporating grease, smoke and such through the washable metal screen. Clean with baking soda, soap, water. Same for cleaning inside your oven, no need for chemicals and so much easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: kindleuser

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: We already had a Broan range hood when we purchased this one. Our first range hood is still working perfectly. It needed replacing because it began to bubble under the paint. It is 18 years old. Concerned that the paint might chip, we decided to replace it. Installing the new range hood was very easy to figure out. The only uncomfortable part was working overhead to attach it. It took about 20 minutes to accomplish and we hope to be good for another 18 years.
customer_reviews.author: marlene

customer_reviews.title: Good value...
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars but the corner of the unit was slight dented. Fortunately it was a back corner and so was not noticeable. The instructions are fairly complete and understandable. The electrical connections were very simple and doable by anyone that's done elementary electrical connections. I ended up buying the cable as I had an outlet the unit would be plugged into. I liked that the unit is convertible with venting either from the top or the center back. I liked that the enclosed filter is machine washable. The unit's not very quiet, but then again I'd only exhaust when needed.
customer_reviews.author: JLM

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and functional!
customer_reviews.text: My white range hood looked awful with the new counter tops and pain in my kitchen. So, not knowing what I was doing, I ordered this one. It has a 10" duct where my old one was 6". My contractor was able to make it work, so kudos to him!!! It's beautiful and sucks smoke and odors out very well! (I had the "opportunity" to use it this week when my oven tried to burn my dinner by overheating my dinner to an extreme temperature! I'm glad I was home . . . could have had a fire if I'd been gone.)
customer_reviews.author: dixiepeach

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is the second unit I ordered after a year and a half. Motor stopped working on the original one. It was cheap enough to get another one
customer_reviews.author: O Batca

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and great value
customer_reviews.text: My husband installed it very quickly. He said it was straightforward and easy to install. It runs great - very quiet and the fans work well.
customer_reviews.author: LidoGirl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality & Easy to Install!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly! Only two small issues was there was no insert for the duct vent. A Duct Boot is what it’s called. But we found that at our local hardware store. Secondly small issue is that there is only ONE speed for the fan vent. NO high, medium or low settings. Only high! But since this is going into my rental, it’s perfect for what we needed! Very clean and no dents or scratches on arrival. Excellent quality! Very easy to install. My dad and I installed this ourselves. Great hood vent for replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Porras

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: The hood is really a great deal I don't think you could buy a replacement motor for the price ! The thing that is nice is getting rid of the old greasy ugly hood for a brand new one that works great . If you were to replace the motor in your old one you would probably have to take hood down anyway , so why not just replace it with a nice new shiny one !
customer_reviews.author: mckennycoy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install replacement
customer_reviews.text: When I replaced my white stove with a black one the white hood looked out of place so I got this to replace the old hood. When it came in the instructions were limited but it was not hard to figure out how to install it. I did need to get a part at the hardware store to connect it to the existing ductwork, but other than that it was a relatively easy install. It looks nice. The light and fan work well. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ramey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this from the warehouse and it was missing several parts that it shouldn't have been missing. Because of this, it was a little difficult for 1 person to install. The fan's noise level is a little bit high. All in all, the value for the price is excellent. Installation is much easier if you use a piece of cardboard to make a template and then tape it to the underside of the cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: regina

customer_reviews.title: it lasted one year only
customer_reviews.text: It died after the warranty was over. The motor stopped working. I guess that is what I paid for but I expected it to last a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Christine S Williams

customer_reviews.title: Fit the new decor of the upgraded kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: Fit the new decor of the upgraded kitchen. Went in fairly easily.
customer_reviews.author: R. W. Buck Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is great. The hood itself is marginal at best...but works as intended.
customer_reviews.text: Customer service has been very good. First unit arrived badly damaged do to exceptionally weak OEM packaging. Replacement box even more so, but thankfully only minor damage. The sheet metal can't be fore than 20 gauge. So thin that moderate finger pressure will bend it. Useless filter. Light shield is pretty lame. Seems to have good airflow and is pretty quiet. Not done running new duct outside (have to go through brick veneer. The hood probably will not make it for more than a couple of years - and at that point I'll upgrade to at least a 16 gauge just like my old Jenn-Aire.
customer_reviews.author: Won Hung Low

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and inexpensive!
customer_reviews.text: This range hood was replacing an exact, older model. It had the same mounting holes as the old one, so installation was super easy. I think it took a total of 15 minutes to remove the outside vent knock-out, connect the wiring and mount it in place. And it came with a vent flapper which I did not expect.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, it was easy to install. If these 2 senior citizens can install it, anyone can!
customer_reviews.author: KMS

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the black one and couldn't be happier. I just can't complain for $40.00 free shipping and received it in 2 days. It works as it should if it lasted only 1-2 years I'd feel as if I got my 💲 worth and turn around and buy the exact same one.
customer_reviews.author: LoJo Pippin

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Very loud noise. Very small fan. Thus, not working at all to get the smoke and odor out from the cooking range. You get what you pay for. After 3 uses, I threw it away. Didn't bother to return it. Went straight to Home Depot and got the best range hood for little more money.
customer_reviews.author: wonderwoman

customer_reviews.title: Ducted range hood.
customer_reviews.text: It is a good replacement for my non-ducted range hood by the same manufacturer. As a matter of a fact, it was exactly the same size and color. However, it was missing the filters for it. I contacted Amazon and was told to order a filter. That filter turned out to be very flimsy. It does now work but the filter is very flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert55

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on a quality product 👍
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. Arrived in perfect shape. It was the largest Amazon box I have ever received. Fan is a lot quieter then the old hood we had. No box stores had these in stock. The fan suction is weaker then our old one but at least it does not sound like a jet taking off like the old one did.
customer_reviews.author: Bob K

customer_reviews.title: Wanted a vent through the roof vent - got one!
customer_reviews.text: Simplicity at its finest. Have you priced these things????? I was very, very happy to find this at this price. I was even more impressed at the quality for this price. I just wanted a very simple, under the counter vent out through the top fan/light. This is nothing fancy. I already had the roof vent so I did not need anything extra. This can also be vented out into the room like most newer models. Not what I wanted. Great find great price perfect fit! easy to install (IF you are a DIY) person. Some just don't like doing even the small "fixes" etc.
customer_reviews.author: hard to please

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice, and priced way cheaper than a home improvement store.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M.

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain
customer_reviews.text: Great bargain. Thinner metal and more flimsier than my original one, but this one works!! The only issue I had was modifying my cabinet from a circular exhaust to the rectangular that this unit has. The screws it came with are very short, and I had to reposition most of the mounting holes, but all this was easily achieved.
customer_reviews.author: Art Perez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install.  Exhausts perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Hood was easy to install and works well. I have zero experience with installing range hoods, but had no issue installing this one. Make sure you turn off your electricity before installing! Also, make sure whatever hood you buy fits the existing exhaust in your walls.
customer_reviews.author: JLee & Banandee

customer_reviews.title: Didn't expect much, got what I expected..
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace a very old range hood (one that had the top vent about 2 inches off center), and I wasn't looking to replace it with the of the uber hoods, so this worked fine. I had to manhandle it into the spot (remember that 2 inches off center thing? Sucked), but it works fine. The fan is a little loud, and it's definitely cheaper made than my last one - plastic fan, only one poorly fitting screen, but it's there now, so I won't have to think about it again for a while (I hope).
customer_reviews.author: Bilbo

customer_reviews.title: Great value and flexible design
customer_reviews.text: Had to send a previous version back bc it wasn't "convertible"(?). Pro tip: make sure the hood you buy will allow for venting out the top or back...unless you know which vent version you need. This one is great bc it allows for either. Install was easy and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: NICE
customer_reviews.text: TURNS OUT I ORDERED A BLACK AND THEY SENT A SILVER ONE AND AS IT TURNS OUT I HAD MADE A MISTAKE AND ORDERED BLACK AND THEY SEEM TO KNOW THAT I NEEDED SILVER SO THEY SENT SILVER AND IT LOOKS GREAT
customer_reviews.author: Perry Zeiger

customer_reviews.title: Looks great & works excellent!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace a 1960’s Range hood. This was very easy to wire and mount! Everything works great and matches our appliances. Highly recommend! :)
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa T

customer_reviews.title: perfect, I just needed the right one
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for the return and replacement of the right one. Now, I am an old guy, so it took 2 people, I couldn't hold it and screw it fast at the same time. But great, thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping great price
customer_reviews.text: Have not installed it yet or write a review on installation. I do like the design and certain yes of the product fast shipping and great price
customer_reviews.author: mike crow

customer_reviews.title: Don’t over think the price.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t over think it! Super easy to swap out! With this price you can’t beat this face lift! Very excited with the price and quality!
customer_reviews.author: Necaise16

customer_reviews.title: Make sure there is enough distance from the burner
customer_reviews.text: If you mount it close to the burner (about 2 ft), the nylon blade of the fan will get burnt. I wish they made metal blade.
customer_reviews.author: An

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Duct was smaller than stated which work okay with repacing mine. Would have been very easy with two people but my husband works a lot and I don't like things laying around. Either way, I am pleased to have a working light above my stove again. Can't beat the price. Great replacement, looks so much better than my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to connect the cord and very easy to install as long as you got the right measurements. Very satisfied..
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Not losing covered space
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for little loud but you can back vented so you don't have to mess your cupboard up above it which makes it handy to not lose your upper cupboard space it's a plus
customer_reviews.author: Brian's

customer_reviews.title: Decent Economy Stove Hood
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be a decent quality stove hood. I had to return the one I received because it had only a rectangular cut-out for venting. The picture appears to be circular. I could have gotten an adapter and re-cut my existing duct to accommodate this but, no. I've purchased these type hoods before and they usually have a precut punch-out with sleeve for circular ducts. Anyway, for the price, this is a good choice for a low budget stove hood. Again, FYI: this accommodates rectangular top-venting ducts.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L.

customer_reviews.title: Best price and easy install
customer_reviews.text: 4 screws and a couple of wires and it was in. The toughest part was punching out the exhaust vent hole but fast easy install and works great.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to replace the once in my sister in laws trailer and it fit perfectly. Cheaper than anywhere else i could find it and very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: James & Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and good quality unit
customer_reviews.text: Swapped it to replace an older hood vent cutting the vent area was easy just use a wire cutter. Easy to mount and wire, done job within 15 mins with the proper tools! Works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Gurpreethira

customer_reviews.title: Great hood
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install. Has been working great. Good suction and quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Dana F

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY A GOOD QUALITY PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for one of my apartments and looks and fits good!!! It is way cheaper than the box warehouses and looks amazing
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Fit and finish
customer_reviews.text: Fits good finish good Installation was not so easy but i'm old so.
customer_reviews.author: N. Christianson

customer_reviews.title: Nice and good price $19.00
customer_reviews.text: Dosen't come with power cable and no bulb light but for $19 dollars it's a great product. I'll upload a picture later.
customer_reviews.author: Deifilia

customer_reviews.title: Fanny
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you order the one that has the right duct you need. There is square ones and round ones. Had to be creative to get mine hooked up.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald K Large

customer_reviews.title: Good deal!
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Direct replacement, so it was extremely easy to install. Haven't needed to clean it yet, but doesn't look like it'll give us a problem.
customer_reviews.author: doug barns

customer_reviews.title: excellent exhaust item
customer_reviews.text: Excellent item for my kitchen, just as the one i had before
customer_reviews.author: Yellowbird

customer_reviews.title: Make sure your vent is rectangular. Easy fit
customer_reviews.text: Fit like a glove. No problems. Make sure you have a rectangular vent. Some are round and you’ll need another model.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Davis

customer_reviews.title: No idea
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and do not know if it was what they wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Easy to replace old one above range top, works as described.
customer_reviews.author: CheetahLee

customer_reviews.title: It's So Good, Like a Good Hood Should...
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, simple to install and includes all necessary hardware. The low setting on the fan is VERY low and almost dead silent.
customer_reviews.author: d1sco5tu

customer_reviews.title: Worth the grind .
customer_reviews.text: Good product for right price . Shipping not so well . Arrived without additional packaging with some dent in the rear .
customer_reviews.author: MARTIN RAISENHOVER

customer_reviews.title: Very nice buy!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect replacement for a rental home. It was exactly like the one we took down from 30 years ago. Took more time to unpack it than it did to install it. We were done in less than 20 minutes. It was refreshing to have a repair go so easily and it works very well at a good price. The local mobile home store was charging more and could not get it as quickly. Definitely would order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: good price, works well
customer_reviews.text: This is not a big fancy fan. Two speeds, high and low. On low (good enough for when you are simmering something, just to keep the excess moisture out of the house), it's quiet. On high it is a bit loud, but is powerful enough to remove oven smoke. This is good enough for the average homeowner, cook and baker. I got it on Amazon because it was half the price at the local stores.
customer_reviews.author: Robin L

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. It was an exact replacement for the old one. Fan is more quiet running than the old one. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: HAROLD HUNTER

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Love mine.. I'm 62 female and installed on my own.. Easy job
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa B.

customer_reviews.title: Simple exhaust / light combo.  perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bright white / simple exhaust fan w/ light combo. Comes with flap style vent closure. Installed quickly. WAAAAY less money than home improvement stores etc.
customer_reviews.author: SteampunkPhotos

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect and great quality!! Can't find a better price anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Smilin

customer_reviews.title: Great range hood!
customer_reviews.text: Install went quick. Love the two speed exhaust fan. Must quieter than the one that quit working. Could install with top exhaust of back exhaust
customer_reviews.author: L. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Nice inexpensive hood
customer_reviews.text: Installed easy, looks nice, inexpensive. It made it easier to install to use longer screws than the ones provided but other than that it went in easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality is good
customer_reviews.text: This running shirt is a 36 inch which is a little larger than normal work fine quiet it’s all very easy
customer_reviews.author: Albert j Sardina sr.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an inexpensive alternative to put in a rental home. It was a perfect fit. It runs like a charm and looks great too!
customer_reviews.author: jmp

customer_reviews.title: Broan Range Hood
customer_reviews.text: We replaced a microwave with this range hood with fan and light. It took two of us to put it in, one to hold it in place and one to attach it. It works well and looks nice. Its not fancy, in fact its down right plain but very functional. The low setting is quiet and the high is loud. Its the economy model so if you want more than that you should upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: motheroflittle

customer_reviews.title: Good product -- but couldn't use
customer_reviews.text: I Mistakenly ordered this in wrong type of "mount" so had to return. Amazon's good policy.....no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Friendly

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Install - Works Great - Looks Good
customer_reviews.text: I have very little in the way of handyman skills and I had no problem at all installing this unit. It fit perfectly into the space. We purchased the unvented unit and I had it installed, replacing another, in about 30 minutes. The light is excellent and the ventilator works very well. The simple function and look not only kept the cost down but also works style wise. The simple design of this range hood looked great in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk Drudgler

customer_reviews.title: works great - and pretty quiet
customer_reviews.text: i saw this at lowes for almost double the price. it works great and is pretty quiet. the directions are not very clear. the wiring is inside of the unit. you will have to use a screw driver to pull away the metal to get to the wires. since this was the first time i had to install one, i did not know this. but the unit is very nice. looks nice with our new stainless and black stove. worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: S. West

customer_reviews.title: Quality Range Hood; Great Value; Easy Installation
customer_reviews.text: Good quality Range Hood. Very easy to install. Looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Kincaid

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: easy to install and great price. we went with the same model that was installed prior and it lasted for 20+ years
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Sucks like it ought to
customer_reviews.text: This thing totally sucks! But it is supposed to so... we are happy.
customer_reviews.author: D. K. Woods

customer_reviews.title: A bit noisy, but does the work and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Was easy to replace a similar old product and to install it myself. Couldn't find a filter to our old model and didn't want to buy an expensive one as we may redo the entire kitchen. So buying this one in a price of a filter, was a good purchase. A bit noisy but does the work it should do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOTHING To Complain About
customer_reviews.text: This hood was bought to replace our older hood. I ordered it on a Sunday evening and it arrived that Wednesday afternoon. It took 40 minutes to take out the old hood and install this new hood. Perfect fit. It has two fan speeds, a light and a washable vent filter. Some of these reviews complain about the fan being noisy when set on the high speed setting. My wife and I do not find this fan noisy at all. For $46, we can find nothing about this hood to complain about.
customer_reviews.author: ken magee

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: Great product, bought as a replacement for one that was 20 years old. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: D L Whatley

customer_reviews.title: Good basic range hood.
customer_reviews.text: This has a rectangular duct opening (not stated in the description) and I had to use an adaptor to hook to my round vent. I am thankful for foil tape! High speed on fan is noisy and moves a lot of air. Low speed quiet and still moves air. One light intensity illuminates area well, nice feature!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: A real bargain price for a great performing hood.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with our Broan Range Hood. It arrived in perfect condition. We can barely hear it while on low and much quieter than our old hood on high. We also like using a standard light bulb up to 75 watts. We did have to trim a little around our opening and it went right in. A real bargain price for a great performing hood.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn L.

customer_reviews.title: It works amazing
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for my kitchen I was perfect for a normal size stove
customer_reviews.author: osvaldo

customer_reviews.title: Beware of cosmetic damage from thin packaging
customer_reviews.text: Installation should have been simple. The vent hole did not line up with my ductwork. Needed modification to make it fit. Now that it is in it works fine for an economy hood. The hood arrived damaged due to poor packaging. The standard packaging is not designed for shipping, there is no protection for the thin metal.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph J Pryst

customer_reviews.title: Fan  is not work after one week Don’t not buy
customer_reviews.text: Simple basic hood but did not work after one week Had insulation done by electrician dose turn on the fan motor I went out after one week do not buy we just got our remodel finished and now have to buy a new hood
customer_reviews.author: Amazing !! Great job

customer_reviews.title: Good unit for the money for sure, however arrived dented.
customer_reviews.text: Installed the unit anyway, as the dent is not enough for me to want to return the unit, wait for another, and install again. For the forty bucks, it will work, and only looking at using this as a unit for a few years. Guessing by reading the reviews, roll the dice, might get an undamaged unit, might not.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: MISSING POWER PLUG
customer_reviews.text: Missing the power plug... useless without it. I looked everywhere for it (even in the electrical panel section) and NOTHING! Aside from it taking forever to get to me. What a waste
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST IN PRICE AND VALUE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Broan Range Hood Fan and it turn out that its the same as the one that I have. It fit just right in place with no problem and this one work well. Its don't make that much noise at all just quiet
customer_reviews.author: Raymond White

customer_reviews.title: Simple
customer_reviews.text: Came with a small dent, but figures. Easy to install for my kitchen setup. The light works great and the high and low fan speeds are excellent. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Hay

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and works!
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice, especially for the price. Works fine. Price much better than local big box store's. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Ervin

customer_reviews.title: Works great, Be Aware of its configuration
customer_reviews.text: This hood works great for me though I had to modify it. I purchased this as a replacement to a much older oven hood which had its power brought in through the left hand side. This hood did not have the option to bring the power in through the left. I got around this by using a drill to create a new hole in the proper location.
customer_reviews.author: N. Gerber

customer_reviews.title: We removed an old crappy microwave for over the fridge and put this in
customer_reviews.text: We removed an old crappy microwave for over the fridge and put this in. It works great - we love it! I initially didn't realize that this DOES NOT come with the wiring that you need but this is my fault for not reading the description thoroughly. I bought the Broan HCK44 Power Cord Kit for pretty cheap and wired it myself and it was good to go! Great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: c7a7h

customer_reviews.title: Light and easy to install

customer_reviews.text: The product description stated it was for a round fan. There was an oblong cut out. Very disappointed!

customer_reviews.title: ... my act together and ordered the right one - perfect fit - easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Once I got my act together and ordered the right one - perfect fit - easy to install. Plus I had to return the first one and it was an extremely easy process

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the money
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for the price. Super easy install very quiet and does a great job helping get heat from cooking out of kitchen. No it’s not too I’d the line but for $40 does work much better than expected

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: It came quickly and my contractor installed it in my new kitchen. Looks great and functions just as my previous Broan. It is a little quieter than my old one, but definitely not whisper quiet.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and easy install!
customer_reviews.text: Installed in 20 min or so! Exact replacement for the old cream colored one. Recommend having tape to seal up the duct work ready at time of install.

customer_reviews.title: A new range hood
customer_reviews.text: We finally changed out our old Range hood ( ours was so old it wasn't white anymore). It did take my husband and I about 3 hours to put it in, we didn't need any special tools, just an screwdriver and some of the vent sealing tape, but when we finally moved the stove out of the way, it went in quickly. It looks so much better than our old one....
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Broan-NuTone 403001 Convertible Range Hood Insert with Incandescent Light, Exhaust Fan for Under Cabinet, White, 6.5 Sones, 160 CFM, 30"
product_meta.description:
Color:White| Size:30-Inch| Style:1.0| Pattern Name:Range HoodUpgrade your kitchen with the Broan Range Hood Insert and Incandescent Light! This versatile insert is the perfect solution to your ventilation needs serving as both an exhaust fan and overhead light for your stove. It operates at 160 CFM and 6.5 Sones for an effective and quiet production with a 2 speed fan option. The white unit is designed to fit neatly underneath your cabinets to provide quality airflow in your kitchen. The duct connector includes a built-in damper and has a dishwasher-safe aluminum grease filter that effectively removes smoke and odors from your cookspace. The protective lamp lens distributes light evenly over the cooktop and accepts up to 75W bulb (not included). It's designed with smooth surfaces that clean easily and quick-release filters that can go in the dishwasher. This range hood installs as 3.25" x 12" ducted vertical or horizonal. Install the insert at least 18" above cook top. The sides are mitered and the bottom edge hemmed, with no sharp edges for safety and good looks. For your convenience, this range hood can work in an ADA-compliant application and includes a 1 year limited warranty. This product is UL listed and HVI-2100 certified for your safety and protection. Enhance your home today with the Broan Range Hood Insert and Light!

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Broan Economy 40000 Series 30" Under Cabinet Ducted Range Hoods feature a two-speed fan, a rocker-type fan and light control, and a polymeric blade and light lens. These range hoods are 160 CFM and have a 6.5 sone rating, for quiet operation. With this kitchen range hood, you have the option of ducting vertically or horizontally. The mitered sides and hemmed bottom ensure safety and clearance of the cabinet door. Keyhole mounting slots make the range hood easier to install. The range hoods are available in White, Almond or Brushed Stainless Steel to match any kitchen.
feature_bullets: HIGH-QUALITY RANGE HOOD INSERT: White hood insert improves ventilation and lighting over your stove at 160 CFM and 6.5 Sones installed with 3.25" x 10" ducted opening with vertical or horizontal discharge
EFFECTIVE INCANDESCENT LIGHTING: A protective lamp lens distributes light evenly over the cook-top and accepts up to 75W bulb (bulb not included)
EASY CARE: One-piece, dishwasher safe aluminum mesh filter means you can maintain optimum grease capture and keep the kitchen fresh
VERSATILE: 2 speed fan with top or rear exhaust options lets you connect the ductwork in the most convenient way for you
IDEAL SIZE: Range hood insert measures 30" and should be installed at least 18" above cook top
160 CFM, 6.5 Sone (vertical or horizontal discharge) performance HVI 2100 Certified
Rocker-type fan and light control; 2-Speed fan
